thread.title: Chicago Cubs vs. St. Louis Cardinals NLDS Game 3 live score: Online stream, TV schedule
thread.title_full: Chicago Cubs vs. St. Louis Cardinals NLDS Game 3 live score: Online stream, TV schedule

author: Nick O'Malley | nomalley@masslive.com
title: Chicago Cubs vs. St. Louis Cardinals NLDS Game 3 live score: Online stream, TV schedule
text:
Channel : Click here for a channel finder to help pin down your local channel. Live Stream 
With the MLB postseason moving to national broadcasts, it's easier to get ahead of an online broadcast. Even the official MLB option is more reasonable. 
The National League games are all on TBS this postseason. Fortunately, TBS has a pretty solid streaming option for desktop and mobile. 
MLB.tv Postseason Package - A package from the league that lets you catch postseason games streaming on your computer and other devices. May not include all ALCS/NLCS games. 
TBS.com (or TBS Mobile app ) - The more reasonable options for those who don't want to pay for a seperate service. 
--- 
The Cardinals turn to young starter Michael Wacha in the big Game 3 start. On the other side is the best pitcher in baseball right now: Jake Arrieta. 
Arrieta is fresh off of a complete game shutout in the Cubs' Wild Card Game win over the Pirates and will look to continue that success in the NLDS. Chicago is getting a huge mid-series boost by sending its ace to the mound. Meanwhile, the Cardinals will be looking for Wacha to bounce back from a rough September, where he post a 7.88 ERA in five starts.
